title: Leather Whip
summaries: The Leather Whip is a whip purchased from the Zoologist for 10. Like other whips, it causes minions to focus on the last-struck enemy and increases their damage against the target.
If the Leather Whip hits multiple targets in a single attack, the damage dealt by each consecutive hit will be reduced by 50%.

statistics.Tooltip:
4 summon tag damage
Your summons will focus struck enemies
'Die monster!'
statistics.Buy: 10
statistics.Sell: 2
